title: Medieval Fantasy Music Pack
description: Medieval Fantasy Music Pack - Elevate Your RPGs, Fantasy Worlds, and More.
longDescription:
Step into the mesmerizing realm of fantasy and epic adventure with our exquisite Medieval Fantasy Music Pack! Featuring 10 meticulously crafted tracks, this awe-inspiring collection transports you to a magical world filled with dragons, knights, and legendary quests. Each composition is a sonic odyssey that elevates your game's ambiance and storytelling to epic heights.


>>Listen Here<<


Tracklist:

  1. Dragonheart
  2. Crown Of Legends
  3. Winterkeep
  4. The Alchemist
  5. Wood Temple
  6. Ancient Ruins
  7. Kingdoms
  8. Echoes From The Past
  9. Arcane River
  10. Path Of The Elder Tree


These compositions are not intended to be played in a loop; they are immersive, non-repetitive soundscapes meticulously designed to enrich your game's environments, narrative moments, and immersive exploration. Whether you're crafting a medieval RPG, a high-fantasy adventure, or any other project craving evocative soundscapes, our Medieval Fantasy Music Pack is your ultimate solution.


Key Features:

  • 10 distinct and atmospheric tracks
  • Ideal for enhancing in-game settings, quests, and exploration
  • Immerse players in a world teeming with magic, wonder, and heroism


Elevate your game's auditory experience to unparalleled heights with the Medieval Fantasy Music Pack. Download it now and embark on a sonic adventure beyond imagination!

Enhance your gaming project with Medieval Music, Fantasy Game Soundtracks, RPG Music, and Epic Fantasy Music that sets the stage for knights, dragons, and mythical adventures. Perfect for Game Development, Sound Design, and adding immersive Exploration Music to your Medieval RPG or High-Fantasy project.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16-bit

Does music loop: Yes, but the music is not intended to be played in a loop.

Total minutes of audio provided : 32:55 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
